pages.text: Accessories are an important part of Terramity, and it's also important to experiment to see what works best for you.$(br2)There are accessories that increase your defense, attack damage, movement speed, abilities, etc.

For example, you could put together a luck build by combining the 'Luck Ring +' to grant yourself Luck II at all times, and also use the 'Lucky Dice' to be able to deal critical hits.$(br2)The 'Luck Ring +' will synergize with the dice charm by increasing your chances of dealing a critical hit!
